definition: to degenerate/impoverished/to fall (into poverty)/to be reduced (to begging)
to sink (into ruin, oblivion)/to be reduced to
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: They were reduced to begging along the street in the end.
sentences.chinese: 最後他們淪落到沿街乞討。

sentences.english: China is always so hot in the summer season; once again descend into a palace otaku.
sentences.chinese: 中國的夏天永遠是那麼炎熱，再一次淪落成深宮宅男。

sentences.english: He impecunious is demoralized, be reduced to poverty does beggar to street.
sentences.chinese: 身無分文的他意志消沉，淪落到街頭做乞丐。

sentences.english: LaoJiangHu ghost uncle, is before the sword, is now home TiTouJiang descends to the porter.
sentences.chinese: 老江湖鬼叔，以前是刀家的門房，現已淪落爲剃頭匠。

sentences.english: This girl goes to Beijing from the driftage after this world of Hunan high mountain runs away from home.
sentences.chinese: 這名女子是從中國湖南嶽陽離家外岀後淪落到首都的。

sentences.english: He will never be dishonest even though hebe reduced to poverty.
sentences.chinese: 他決不會不誠實，縱然淪落到貧困境地。

sentences.english: I never thought he would come down to begging.
sentences.chinese: 我怎麼也想不到他會淪落到乞討爲生。

sentences.english: And you with a smile, let me fall in your tender.
sentences.chinese: 而你回眸一笑，讓我淪落在你的溫柔。

sentences.english: Miss river's clan, the grandpas all degenerated to the degree of gripping a package of elder brother amplitude.
sentences.chinese: 就想江族，爺爺都淪落到抓包哥哥的程度了。

sentences.english: The Depression reduced many to begging on street corners.
sentences.chinese: 大蕭條使許多人淪落到街頭乞討。

sentences.english: Mr. zhuang, you want a "girl" to be your protector?
sentences.chinese: 莊先生，你已經淪落到要一個女孩子來保護你了嗎？

sentences.english: A person live in love, why reduced.
sentences.chinese: 線一個人好好過，何苦在愛情裏淪落。

sentences.english: But the poet more lives, medium, but Jun.
sentences.chinese: 但是詩人多薄命，就中淪落不過君。

sentences.english: Love is not the two lovers, will have a reduced wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 愛情沒能兩情相悅，必然會有一個人淪落荒野。

sentences.english: The poor man was reduced to begging.
sentences.chinese: 那可憐的人淪落爲乞丐。

sentences.english: As you well know, Volkswagen has given in to the Dark Side.
sentences.chinese: 就像你知道的那樣，大衆汽車已經淪落進了黑暗勢力。
